text:
For httpd 2.4.1: At least the default installed httpd.conf file (and some conf files in the conf/extra subdirectory and the README in the source tarball) contains a link to 

 http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/

what should probably replaced by something like

 http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/

Jens
 
P.S.: Within the main Apache httpd-2 bugzilla bug input page are not yet a version "2.4.1" choosable.(si I used 2.4-HEAD).
creator: Jens.Schleusener@t-online.de

text:
Thanks, wrong links fixed in r1291307.
2.4.1 added to version list in Bugzilla.
Have fun with 2.4.

Note: 2.4.1 is not yet officially released, but you won't have to wait long ;)

Rainer
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
